No clue how this could happen.
Which VM are you running? Are getting other exceptions before that somehow are not logged?

As the trace says "java.fullversion=J2RE 1.4.2 IBM J9 2.2 Linux x86-32
j9xia32142-20040826 (JIT enabled)"

There were no other exceptions that I know of....

Doug, have you seen this lately? I don't have any idea how this could happen 
(maybe some VM wierdness while debugging), so I will probably close this as 
WONTFIX.
No I haven't seen this lately.  "WORKSFORME" is probably a good choice....
Closing. Please reopen if you see this again. Thanks!
